title: Paypal Declines No Matter What I try
body: Recently I've been trying to purchase riot point but i never have any success. I have to use paypal duo to the credit card service still being down in my region so paypal seems to be the logical choice. So far i have created two separate paypal accounts and tried **4 different cards** (including a prepaid gift card that i purchased at a local store) but it always says "This payment cannot be completed and your account has not been charged. Please contact your merchant for more information." **Please Help**.

replies.body:
For the LoL store, Paypal requires you to link a full credit/debit/bank card as the primary. Prepaid or gift type credit cards won't let you make purchases.
If you don't have one attached, you might encounter issues like this.

If you do have one attached and still run into this problem, please write in a support request and share your ticket number with me. I'd be happy to troubleshoot with you further in private. :)
